𒁁 bat, bad, badr /bař/ 𒑙 brachio part

𓅭 𓏏 pato bātu bat "duck" 𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 | duck , bird | apad avid ⇔ 𓅭 bat = duckyt

𓂧 𓎼 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅭 | bat (mammal) | 🦇 duckyt ≈ 𓅭 bat 𓂧 𓂋 𓎼 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅭 | bat (mammal) | 🦇 dracula™ ≈ 𓅭 drake 𓂧 𓂋 𓎼 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅭 | bat (mammal) | 🦇 жарқанат zharqanat, “flapping wing” +++ 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 | bat (mammal) | denevér de…ér 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 <> drake 𓂧 𓎼 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅭 | bat (mammal) | 🦇 Zug-Tier in sˣak musen 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓐍 𓅓 𓅱 𓏯 | type of bat (mammal) | ჭუკი č̣uḳi მესერია meseria <> ოხვამეშ oxvameš 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓐍 𓅓 𓅱 𓏯 | type of bat (mammal) | sˣuakʳ musen ≈ surca pizigaun sōrex “mouse” 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓐍 𓅓 𓅱 𓏯 | type of bat (mammal) | Spackenum
